name: Milwaukee 48-22-0325 Compact Wide Blade Magnetic Tape Measures
short_description: Milwaukee 48-22-0325 Tape Measure, 25 ft L Blade 1 in W Blade, Steel Blade, Black/Red
Our 25 ft compact wide blade magnetic tape measure has up to 15 ft of reach and a magnet that easily attaches to EMT and steel studs.
The tape is wear and impact-resistant with nylon blade protection and an additional anti-tear coating on the first 6 in of the blade, reducing tape tear.
Built-to-withstand the jobsite, the compact measuring tapes are constructed with a five-point reinforced frame for impact resistance.

Measure from any angle with versatile, double-sided blade printing

product_description: Built to survive anything you throw its way, this ToughSeries 25 ft. Tape Measure is strong enough to endure a drop from up to 100 ft.** Easily measure large spans without help with 17 ft. of max reach*. Measure from any angle with ToughSeries, the first DEWALT tape measure to have double-sided print. For added convenience, the 25 ft. Tape Measure includes a removable magnet for the hook and patented hook connection technology that allows you to choose when to deploy it on the jobsite. A wear-resistant blade coating maintains long-term utility and 6 in. of Rip-Shield protective layering safeguards the hook for long life.

name: DURATECH 25FT Auto-Lock Tape Measure, Easy Read Magnetic Measuring Tape with Fractions 1/8″, Double Sided Measurement Tape with Minimum Scale 1/32″, Magnetic Hook, and Rubber Protective Casing
short_description: PREMIUM MATERIALS: Crafted from high-quality, thickened carbon steel and coated with a durable nylon layer, this engineer tape measure ensures long-lasting performance. It’s designed to be stiff enough to extend up to 7 feet without bending, making it ideal for precise measurements. The robust ABS plastic shell and TPR rubber casing provide superior wear resistance and drop protection.

MAGNETIC HOOK FOR EASY MEASURING: Equipped with strong magnets at the end of the tape, this measuring tape effortlessly grips to any metal surface. The double-sided fractional scale simplifies single-person measurements, even over long distances, providing ease and accuracy without assistance.

SELF-LOCKING MECHANISM: The intuitive self-locking feature offers a smooth and reliable lock for stable measurements. The tape measure retracts easily with a press, and locks securely with no risk of sudden retraction, ensuring safe and precise use every time.

PORTABLE AND CONVENIENT DESIGN: Featuring a built-in wrist strap and belt clip, this tape measure is incredibly easy to carry. Whether you’re working indoors or outdoors, simply hang it from your waist or wear it on your wrist when your hands are occupied. Perfect for professionals on the go.

PRECISE MEASUREMENT SYSTEM: With a 7/8” blade width and clear 1/8-inch fractional marks, this tape measure ensures easy-to-read measurements. It also includes feet marks, triangle indicators every 19.2 inches, and boasts a minimum scale of 1/32 inch, making it an essential tool for engineers, builders, carpenters, and DIY enthusiasts.

name: WORKPRO Heavy Duty Tape Measure, 2 Pcs 25FT Retractable Tape Measurement, Double Retract Long Stand Measuring Tape Accuracy 1/32 for Engineer, with Magnetic Hook, Belt Clip, Rubber Protective Casing
short_description: Sturdy Tape Design: Our heavy-duty measuring tape features a tape that measures 1.1 inches in width, ensuring maximum rigidity and a long stand over 9.8 feet. The magnetic hook allows for easy measurement on metal surfaces, making it perfect for any job

Convenient Portability: With a belt clip and black carrying strap, our measuring tape is designed for easy transport and accessibility. The black strap can be worn around the wrist for quick and easy access while working

Clear Markings: The yellow tape with black markings provides clear and easy-to-read measurements in inch scale, with a minimum accuracy of 1/32 inch. The inch measurements satisfy most users' needs, while the clear contrast between the tape and markings makes reading measurements a breeze

Double Retract Design: Our measuring tape features a double brake design, with a retract button located both above and below the tape measure. This allows for quick and easy locking and releasing of the tape, making it perfect for on-the-go measurements

High Quality and Resistant: The measuring tape is encased in a high quality ABS and TPR rubber shell that can withstand drops and wear and tear. The nylon coating on the tape also ensures longevity and durability, making it a reliable tool for any job
